title: Mehdi Hasan | Trump's Witness Tampering; Wisconsin GOP's Power Grab: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the how Donald Trump along with Republicans in Michigan and Wisconsin pose a threat to democracy.

Then, journalist Mehdi Hasan talks about his unique advantage in interviewing Trump's proxies and the main difference between the British and American press.

After that, Hasan takes a few more questions backstage from Late Night producer Henry Melcher.
